name: Operation Chromite Simulation Game
description:
Operating Method

Turn Page >>> Space Bar

Move >>>  Rudder Key

Restart >>> R

When your character touches a wall, enemy, or light, you lose your life and go back to the beginning.

Safely reach the green area.

Thank you.
